reviews.review_text: Another Clean Home Depot! Everything is well arranged and their staff were helpful! Was a bit confused where the entrance was but found it after. I always go to their Richmond location which, is as clean and well arranged as this location as well. The person who helped me was really helpful and considerate. I just forgot his name. :( Keep it up team!

Customer service at place is  . Wanted to get colors for our first wooden paint project, the person was really helpful and gave so much detailed knowledge about different types of colors and  what and when to use. Wish could remember his name. But he was at the colour section and made everything so easy. Thanks to him this project is coming out really good We forgot one of the paint bottle at the payment counter but the lady Name Dolly came all the way to parking lot to give the forgotten color. That kind is service is really rear this days. Thanks again The Home Depot Cambie. For such a great experience.

This morning when I arrived just before the store opened at 7am a young man was watering the plants outside, smiled and wished me good morning. Then when the store opened he let me know I could go in. When I walked into the store I was greeted with friendly helpful staff. This was a testament to the staff working at this store and it was a great start to my day. Thank you!

I had the opportunity to deal with a fantastic employee at this location, her name is Ana B. and she is in appliances, I needed a new washing machine but had to tackle a small adjustment at my apartment to accommodate this new washer. She connected me with a tradesman and got me signed up for a HD credit card which provided incentives for using it, she literally handled everything. I d love to find out how I can let her employer know how great and informed she was but this seems to be the only platform .

Love this branch! We ve been coming here for over 3 times now and every staff we met was friendly, patient and super helpful!!! We were able to replace our blinds and find drywall materials with staff s help. Will come back for other purposes too. Thank you to the staff who helped us! :)

Had an amazing experience at this store on 7/11/23. I went in to buy a portable bbq but it was out of stock and only the expensive one was available. 3 different associates, including the supervisor, came to help me figure out the right bbq to buy within my price range and looked for deals in their system. They even stuck around to help me choose some accessories as well. It felt like a family environment and I was well taken care of. I wish I got their names!
I was just at home Depot and i was eally happy the way the staff treated me they helped me locate what i needed thanks
Thanks John for your patience. I am looking for wax nail silicon for my toilets. The  service is extremely good and important to me. Good store.

Experience a hassle-free self-checkout process where assistance is readily available without the intrusion of a security guard demanding your receipt. The seamless checkout system stands in stark contrast to the disappointing service encountered at Canadian Tire.

To the sweet older gentleman who sold me my air conditioner 10+ years ago, I have never forgotten you! It is because of you I survive every summer. I was in a greenhouse worthy sweltering apartment at the time and this man was amazing. Along with his professionalism, he went full Dad mode, full of care and empathy, and treated me like family and pointed me in the right direction,  and gave me hot tips how to get the most out of my A/C. Sadly I have totally forgotten his name, but its never too late for a good review. So wherever you are, thank you! :)

Maybe a little small in comparison with others but they have everything you need. The prices are fair enough. Too many self check-outs. People here are experts, they could understand my need and help me successfully. Definitely, a good place to go shopping.
I had to change the faucet in the kitchen, I went to home depot to look for my options and affordable prices. I found what I needed quality on discount price and I left satisfied.

I visited this store as my  Home Depot card had an issue, I was assisted by a girl named  Palak  at customer service. She had to contact their backoffice for further support. It was not a straightforward case. She did her best to help me.. she was very professional & courteous. The world is beautiful when we have people like her
Lots of big, decorative tropical plants meant mainly for interior design and less so for plant-lovers. Excellent selection of adhesives!

Great deal on outdoor furniture set. Only $398, half what we expected to pay. Gardening time, loads of supplies and great selection on plants. We were able to get all our palm trees delivered for only $70 in the Vancouver area.
It always had everything needed. Very helpful staff as well, especially an older gentleman, patiently explaining all the technical details.

I have to give the biggest praise to Paul and Peter in the tool department. I went in with a problem with a nut and bolt that wouldnt come off. They were absolutely incredible and patient with me, trying everything under the sun to get it off all with a smile. I cant thank them enough for their help. I hope upper management read this and they get the kudos they deserve! Simply the best customer service you could ever ask for.
Compact Home Depot in the moddle of the City, which has everything.. This is my always preferred Hardware store in Vancouver and have been here many times.. Friendly and multi cultured staff..
Unlike other large chains offering similar products, I find the service and knowledge at Home Depot is excellent!
Very helpful staff especially in the home furnishing department. Always someone asking if you need a hand with anything. Only thing is parking is not free underground.

I encountered 2 of the nicest most professional sales associates ever, I wish Id taken the time to get names, one was in home lighting area and another in the electric fireplace area. Both took the time to ensure my pleasure in purchase. 100% satisfaction

I had a great experienced during my visit.5 star for Rod with this initial RN  (staff from paint section) He helped me getting the right colour. Very patience helping me as he tried many times to get the right one that I need.
This location is amazing  ! Bought a Aloe Vera plant    for only $6.00! Customer service was great and I m soo happy the kind cashier convinced me to sign up for the Home Depot rewards program  !
Great  customer service  . . Parking.  Can see online before going there.

We bought online to collect in store at 8th and Cambie - when we got there, we had to pick up bits we forgot to buy online. We got so much help, friendly and warm staff, we were kinda shocked how positive our experience was. Then at customer service, it got even better (Kaylan was amazing and super helpful). Not sure how they have managed to have so many good people there .but thank you big time.
Self checkouts are a bit confusing at first but can get in and get out in a short amount of time

I have been working on a renovation of our home in Whistler, at times the task has been daunting.  After repeated visits to the Home Depot on Cambie, I feel compelled to share my experience.  The level of customer service at this particular  store is nothing short of outstanding.  I was assisted by Ana Baya and Quentin Millet.  They were both friendly, professional, and highly competent.  They listened to me explain what I needed and they showed a real desire to get everything done properly.  In an era where such fantastic personal service seems to be disappearing, Ana and Quentin have given me hope that there are still people who care about competence and professionalism.  This Home Depot has earned my business long into the future and I wholeheartedly recommend this business to anyone and everyone.

Everything you need is in this store and the staffs attitude is excellent. Also, the staff speak different languages and this is great. If you are not satisfied with your purchase, you can return your purchase without any problems.

Home depot has one of the best customer services, there is always someone checks with you while shopping and give their input about the products and suggestions. It actually doesnt matter how much price difference they have in the market along with the competitiors. When someone greets you with a smile and thanks you while leaving, its an amazing culture. I believe strongly only happy employees can make a business move forward to the future. Thanks for both the management and employees.

I was having trouble with online ordering- I think it was having issues because of traffic. So I decided to go to the store. Usually somewhere like this would overwhelm me. Immediately upon entering a young man asked if I needed any help and I showed him photos of the things I needed and he brought me to each area and helped me pick them out. Very painless, Im very happy with my trip there. Fair pricing and the store was very clean and organized.

Great location for this store. Very convenient. They dont have lumber, but the store on Terminal Avenue is not far. Most staff is amazing, helpful and knowledgeable, but theres also some who are totally lost. Not many, but once you deal a few times with them, you know to avoid. :) parking is underground shared with Save On and they reimburse for parking, at least for now. Overall great.

I was helped today by Rhyce, who was quite helpful and friendly. Went above and beyond to make sure all of my questions are answered and did not hesitate to show me all the related products. Overall, amazing customer service and well done to Rhyce. Canadian Tire can really learn a thing or two from the people who work here...
Amazing Customer service by Rohit. He s extremely knowledgeable and helpful

I had a somewhat difficult return (the store didnt have stock on the product I needed, etc.) and I thought for sure it would be an issue. Enter J.C., who I assume was a manager of some sort, who took customer service to the next level and sorted out the situation. Not only did I get what I wanted but J.C. got me an upgrade AND saved me money! What an amazing customer experience - I am thrilled!
Grateful to Home Depot on Cambie for donating building activity kits and more to my kids classroom. They really brought joy to all the littles before the holiday!

This location is very convenient to drop by and pick up items that we need. On our recent visit, we needed a little paint to patch up an older closet door colour. Found out the store offered a colour matching service. The technician scanned the colour and prepared a sample with the precise shade and sheen we needed. We also bought new washer and drier here. Talked to John who was very supportive and knowledgeable and helped us pick the right model and accessories we needed.

Yesterday I experienced the best customer service that I ve EVER received.  Early in the day I went to the Terminal Home Depot and bought a lightbulb.  When I got home and opened it there was actually nothing in the package.  Later in the day I was headed to Cambie street to grocery shop and thought that I d try returning the empty package for one with a bulb.  I anticipated that I may not get a return on the empty package due to it being a different HD location as well as it depending on their discretion.  Not only did I get an apology for the empty package; I also received a refund AND a new bulb.  It wasn t until I was on the drive home that I realized I hadn t asked the employee his name.  I m assuming that he was the manager-listed on my receipt as AJ Fraser.  Whoever you were-THANKS AGAIN.
I have received an amazing customer service from Paula who is working in pluming department. She is really knowledgeable, patient, and super friendly!

Wouldn t usually get excited enough about hardware stores to write a review. But I was helped by so many kind and helpful staff, all of whom seemed to be enjoying their jobs. A pleasure to shop there.

Great experience. Went in to get a couple of keys cut and had to ask an associate where to go. When i got to the department Inquired at the service desk and an associate walked me over to the key cutting machine which was a self serve machine. Never had encountered one of these before so the guy was going to show me how to use it but ended up cutting my two keys himself and was a super friendly guy. As it turned out, the self service machine didnt have the blank key I needed so the associate had use the manual machine. His customer service was great. Prices of comparable merchandise at Canadian Tire is probably priced a little better. footnote: The key that the automatic machine cut is really poor- barely works. The one the guy did manually, perfect. Sometimes automation isnt all that.
Great customer service and an awesome shopping experience

I dont know what theyve done differently but Ive noticed that the staff is always friendly and helpful.  I keep saying that they are extra nice and make my shopping experience more pleasant. I also notice that the staff have not pointed where things are to me 95% of the time. Instead, they walk with me to the product I am looking for, even if they were in the middle of restocking shelves.  If they did point me to the correct department, I was met with another staff person to further assist me.

Had a phenomenal experience with Yuri, he took time to advise me on different options of weather stripping and even showed me products online that may better suit my needs. He was very pleasant and friendly, genuinely seemed happy to help me out. People like Yuri make me more likely to come back to Home Depot for any advice or products I need.

One of the best store, amazing location I usually deal with hardware section, i buy tools for my business and other equipment, the Manager Mr. Mohammad on tools section is such an amazing and helpful person that always you go and if your not sure, ask he gives you good recommendations on different tools, highly knowledgeable very helpful. Most of them they, are super helpful. like today I wanted to pick up some equipment for my new business i was not sure about because of different brands, but luckily Come across Mr. Mohamad he gives me good recommendations, about tools which is suitable for my business, thanks Mohammad for being such a helpful kind and your awesome customer service, and your the real Manager with excellent knowledge about your Department, and Mr. Akash on the customer service desk, cash counter also super helpful guy , most of the employees are amazing so far whichever i come across whenever i go to this Store. Thats why even i stay far but because of their great attitude and understanding I go to this combie store always. Keep it up guys.

Experienced some awesome service today.   The manager at the front (sorry didn t get your name - Big guy) and Rohit who spent time with me giving me advice on LED lights to the guy who helped me at the self check out ( I had a basket of items and he literally started scanning my purchases and explained to me how the parking ticket works). Thx !!!
My professor and I came in yesterday and were helped by a lovely gentleman named Girma. He was pleasant, funny and he helped us find everything we needed. It was a great experience thanks to him!

Theres an employee in the paint section (I believe his name is Ron), hes awesome! He actually asks if you need help and directs you to what youre looking for (sounds simple but keep in mind I wasnt sure what I needed). In the past 2 days hes helped me twice and I cant say enough good about the guy. Lets just say if I had a business Id be trying to poach him to work for me

This Home Depot is set up a little differently as its geared towards condo dwellers in the city rather than in large part to pros and contractors. There were plenty of staff available to help with finding products and answering questions. There was plenty of stock for the product I was looking for whereas it was sold out it a few stores closer to me. Just be aware that this store, being smaller, I believe doesnt carry lumber and other building materials. They do have a great selection of everything else. I love shopping here every once in a while when I get into town from Burnaby.

Make no mistake, this is a small Home Depot. If you were looking for a wider range of construction stuff you need to head to the one on Terminal. However this one has a fantastic location and the staff ratio is a bit better than other places meaning you can usually get more help if you need it. However some of the more detailed departments like electrical and plumbing dont have quite the level of experience as other Home Depots do. But of course that depends on the time and day that you were going. I shop here at least twice a week and in general its well-stocked in all departments unless you need lumber or bigger outdoor stuff. The tool and paint department are especially amazing and have high-quality staff. Not to say that other departments dont... But theyve been exceptional in my ongoing home rental. Parking below is $3 but they comp you $3 off your bill when you check out if you ask. If you need to pick up bits and pieces of things and arent driving, its only one block from the SkyTrain line which makes it exceptional for a lot of people in their daily commute. Hats off to this location!

Youre lucky to have staff like Ben. I wanted to buy Calcium chloride to use as Humidifier, but it was sold only in the winter season, so there was out of stock. But staff named Ben went underground and found it and gave it to me.I was really impressed by the kind staff.

This is my first time in this store. I was impressed by Fiona. She helped me a lot for finding my stuff. This store is kind of small compare to the other store because it is located in the building - sharing with Save-on-food and winners. That is why I was kind of lost because I get used to the set up of the big store. Fiona is very friendly and patience because she answered all my question and gave me the right direction where I should go to find the stuff. Thank you for helping me today Fiona. I am highly recommended Fiona if you need any help in the store. Fiona, You are ROCK STAR! I give you 5 *****!
Bought exactly what I needed with help from employee. Very polite and knowledgeable about my questions. Excellent service from store.
This location doesnt carry rigid insulation which is frustrating (4 stars), but Corey was super helpful and friendly finding me the other items I was looking for (bonus star).

Service at this store is amazing, particularly a man named Al. Every time I go there he knows everything about everything and is kind, funny, and so thoughtful!!! You will be so lucky to have him help! I have been there many other times before, each employee being very helpful. Well done cambie thanks for making my life so much easier!!

Great experience with Home Depot at the Cambie store, and I would always go back to Home Depot, and they are fair with great pricing. I praise their customer service, and customer service is going down everywhere else,  but not at Home Depot. Thank you Sorous you were very friendly, helpful, honest, understanding and knowledgeable.

Home depot is a fantastic one stop shopping place. Anything from kitchen cleaners at great prices to full out kitchen makeovers.  The garden centre is great, plus all everything one may need for every part of the home. The staff are amazing! Helpful, patient, polite, nice and someone is always around to help. Great great prices and professional tips.
Prefect staff and very good customer service
Excellent customer service! Nate who was in the paint department helped me out last week to get supplies for insulating my AC unit. Really helpful! The best home depot location in BC.

Aziz in the plumbing aisle in 2 minutes helped me find the product I needed and had spent already an hour in trying to find in 3 different stores and after returning some parts. He saved me at least an hour in getting the wrong product again and return it and guess some more and be really frustrated and tired. Thank you, Aziz!

Been shopping at Home Depot for a decade. First time at this store, fairly large purchase. Cs rep Kaylen was the first associate ever to ask me if I m a pro member and that it s a point system I can sign up for. Thank you!

I was helped by a man called Bill. He was unbelievably helpful and an amazing employee. He is the epitome of customer service and I have gained a lot of resect for the home depot brand solely after my interaction with him. A pleasure.
Super good location. Pretty easy to navigate and super friendly staff. They helped me test fit a product to ensure it was the correct size.

They made me extra keys for a padlock. 2 days later i forgot my keys at home, but there at work was the extra keys in the office  so i was able to borrow one for the day and all went smooth. Thanks to the people at home depot.

Great experience today!  I needed a certain type of light bulb and the gentleman who helped me was very knowledgeable and the bulb he picked for me worked perfectly!  I didn t catch his name but it was around 1230-1245pm today, Sunday April 3rd.
Saturday, 12/10 I was attended by Mr. Femi this guy gave me the best attending that I have had in Canada. He was awesome with me. Thank you Man

This has got to be the best home depot Ive ever been in. It amazes me how helpful and knowledgeable every single staff member is on anything you ask them. Even if the place is super busy...there will still be someone there to help you, exactly when you need it. Ive never once wandered around searching for help in this store. It really is the best home depot!

Shout out to Harj at the Cambie location. He was awesome to talk to. We re pretty much grout experts now: )  Our penny tiles have been grinded and look amazing already. On to the next steps tomorrow. Thanks so much for your help!

Just when I thought the product I was looking for has sold out. The lady at the cashier, Marissa, has kindly directed me to the staff, Daniel, at the front desk to help me search for it. Daniel not only searched what s on display, he even helped me checked the inventory storage. Eventually he and the other guy working at the department found the product I needed. Thank you awesome staffs at Homedepot Cambie

two Salespeople in two different departments provided me with exceptional service. Both spent the extra few minutes in asking and clarifying exactly what I needed, or order to give me the correct product for my needs. Both were not what I initially asked for or would have purchased without their help. Both of their recommended items worked perfectly, and were cheaper.

Managed to make a stop and found very kind staff who help get one last thing I needed. Thank you everyone for being so attentive. The cashier also helped me fill out the survey so I wouldnt miss on the opportunity to get spending cash at Home Depot. I could use that

What great customer service. We were looking for simple items such as hooks and George was so helpful in finding those for us. He gave me options from expensive to affordable and really took care of our needs. We usually experience great customer service at this store.
Its a Home Depot, they have the stuff. What else do you need to know? They helped me fix my blinds and gave me some flooring as well. Great service. Norm is my man. Thank for being helpful.

The Customer Service is AMAZING. This is by FAR the best home depot customer service i have experienced. Be patient with the staff when you need help since it can get busy easily but their staff are more than willing to help. Highly recommend

I find the one in cambie to be much better than on terminal. The staff are friendly and helpful. I started buying my paint here as home hardware in downtown is useless. The staff here are knowledgeable, fast and that is worth the Canada line or walk to get there

Had to pick up a paintbrush for some construction-related work. Not necessarily found exactly what I was looking for; however, the one I did find was close enough. Basically, The Home Depot carries a wide variety of products, so you will end up finding what you need. Also, an associate there was super helpful and went through great lengths in trying to find the specific paintbrush I was after. This meant him personally checking in different areas for it. Great customer service and selection makes The Home Depot a go-to store!

EXCELLENT Service. Quick, efficient, knowledgeable and great range of products. All I needed was an Air Conditioner however all of the aforementioned aspects of my experience were top notch. Thank you, Home Depot!

We were looking to replace toilets in our condo, and for bath and kitchen facets. The woman who helped us was amazing in her knowledge and her advice.  We checked around other so called higher end stores...the same products were much less expensive at Home Depot and the service much better...so they get our business.

I had an AMAZING experience at Home Depot Cambie!!! Yesterday, Zameer helped me so very kindly pick out the most beautiful plants He was so helpful, patient, kind, and so sweet Then today, I called asking about a plant and Rosemary helped me on the phone, again, she was so kind, so patient and took the time to tell me what to do to save my plant with products I have at home, she was not trying to sell me anything, just being so kind and helping me save my poor plant, she took the time to talk to me about the plant and what it needs and what I should to to save it Bless their hearts, that place now because of these two AMAZING beautiful people is now my favorite Thank you Zameer and Rosemary for your outstanding customer service and kind hearts   will be coming back to see you sooooon

I go to this Home Depot if I have to drive extra time. I have not once seen an employee walk by a customer without paying attention to their needs, helping to carry something, or just helping to brainstorm how exactly to put that project together. I really appreciate this customer service team
My fav store to browse for my Reno or tools. Loved the plan offered in the mail for my large purchases.
Staff at front entrance very helpful. Was told the right row near the far end. Staff in the row showed the section and adl

Home Depot staff are indeed very helpful and knowledgeable. Went in looking for a custom install or other options and was given lots of advice. Even with the speculation that HD couldnt do the job, they gave me many references and recommendations. Thanks Home Depot!

We all know when we need a trip to Home Depot.  Very handy location for this part of the city. It is a relatively smaller store geared toward the city people living in condos and apartments. They have a good home appliance section.

Bought a new BBQ today at this location. The staff were all very friendly and helpful. One staff member, Arthur, really stood out. He not only found us a pre assembled BBQ (saving us lots of time) but he also helped me load the BBQ into the car and made sure all the smaller parts were safely placed elsewhere in the car so they they wouldnt break. Thanks so much for your kind service today, Arthur.

This Home Depot is perfectly situated On busy Cambie Street at the foot of Cambie bridge. It is wedged between save on foods grocery store and a Winners HomeSense furnishings store. Across the street is A BC liquor commission and Whole Foods and  Canadian tire as well as Best Buy are along the same strip. You can certainly spend the entire day in this area getting everything you need and running all your errands in one place. The Home Depot itself is always immaculately clean, And as usual with the Home Depot stores has a typical layout. This particular store does not have a contractor section so you ll have to go to another location if you re looking for building supplies such as lumber or other building materials. This location as well staffed and seems to cater to the small home renovation DIY as well as the casual home shopper. The stock is actually very good and it carries a lot of seasonal inventory. Despite Covid times, the hours of operation are actually pretty typical and all of the standard Covid precautions are in place and well laid out.  Come here pretty much every weekend for one thing or another.

Came into town to help a friend move, needed supplies and tools (as moving in gifts). While at the power tool section I was assisted by two associates, and then a Techtronic Industries Representative (company that owns/makes the red power tools I was perusing). The TTI Rep ran me through all the products that I was considering and helped me pin down a tool kit. Overall, I had a very positive and fruitful experience on this and subsequent visits.
Great service and friendly staff. Great selection of items.

I had a good experience with both the ordering and installation of custom kitchen counter tops. The lady pictured here (Sarah) went above and beyond. We picked through the receipt to see where I could cut the cost. Each sink was going to be $100 each just to disconnect them. I called my own plumber who disconnected, installed new sinks, drains and faucets for the same fee. Every detail was explained to my satisfaction. Installers they contracted were good too. Would use again.

AMAZING experience, seriously. I had a whole list of things and one employee walked me through the store and helped me find everything. Then, when I accidentally dropped my card and didnt notice he chased me around the store to return it to me. Absolutely amazing, well done Im so happy with the service.

We had the most pleasant and efficient customer care from Sara (Bath Dept) . She listened to our needs and provided options to our bathroom renovation supplies with confidence .  She expedited our credit card application patiently when we did not realize it needed an update. Meantime, delivery of our purchase by Canada Cartage represented by Travis & Hardeep, was timely, carefully handled/ coordinated and professionally friendly.  These are the top-notch staff that keep Home Depot, our hands-down & top-of-mind recall for all of our home projects. Keep shining Sara, Travis & Hardeep (Canada Cartage) !
A very nice lady helped me today (I overheard she spoke cantonese with another customer, but didn t ask for her name :( )She is so nice and calm and soothing as she spoke!
I love that they re open at 7am. I love the paint selection and paint department staff. Their garden centre coulda been a little better this past summer. Maybe next? All around great store!

Every time Im here everyone is so friendly and helpful. Today the nicest man helped me choose lightbulbs for my apartment that will last way longer than the ones I was using, which burn out every 6 months and were almost $15 each. Very much appreciated :)

We bought a Weber BBQ from this location and could not have been better looked after, Reza and Randall were amazing, we had an issue on delivery but it was swiftly sorted out, very well run store with happy and friendly staff, you can see they are a great team. Thx guys!
Love this store its clean products laid out in very nice organized fashion and the staff every where  helping me when I asked highly recommended
Super nice friendly staff!! Best customer service!!!!
The location is good lots ot traffic to get there and they do charge parking but home depot reimburses you for that. The store is well layed out.

I dont usually post reviews, but the Home Depot on Cambie has amazing staff, and I couldnt leave this unsaid. On two occasions, the staff has gone above and beyond and offered excellent customer service. I had to fix a baseboard that was ruined by my dog, and Dieter, I believe his name was, offered to cut the piece to the required measurement.  He even brought it to his home to cut the angle properly, and brought it back the next day for me. Just the other day again, I went back to  look for a patio set. Peter was very helpful and friendly. I highly recommend this Home Depot location.

Ana went above and beyond not only to look for a product that didnt have quantities displayed online, but when she originally couldnt find them, didnt give up until they were located! She really helped me and was genuine and overall amazing!

Best customer service I ever had! I was buying the last christmas tree which was the one on show, they had no boxes left but guy figured out the way to box it, helped me do so, even getting hurt in the process but still made it to the end and all that at no price! Not to mention the fact that christmas decorations in here are way cheaper than ones in the Canadian tire down the road.
